attributes.additional_details: Currently anti-semitism is sadly on the rise in parts of the UK, and this would be a statement to the Jewish community in our country and also to those in other countries that they are valued and welcome in our society, and that criticism of their beliefs is completely invalid.
attributes.background: Holocaust denial is explicitly or implicitly illegal in 17 countries. We should change the law to make Holocaust denial illegal in the UK, and urge other countries to follow suit.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/325900
